messages.content: What is the purpose of the BrevImage custom node in ComfyUI?
The BrevImage custom node is designed to allow users to load an image from a URL within the ComfyUI interface.
How can I use BrevImage within ComfyUI?
To use the BrevImage custom node, you will need to configure it with a valid image URL within the ComfyUI interface.
What type of URL can be used with BrevImage?
You can use any valid URL for an image file. BrevImage will attempt to load the image from the URL provided.
Does BrevImage support all image file formats?
While BrevImage attempts to support a wide range of image file formats, there may be limitations based on the codecs available in the environment where ComfyUI is running.
Can BrevImage also load images from local files?

The description of BrevImage specifies that it loads images from URLs. It's recommended to refer to the specific node documentation or inquiry with the developers if local file loading capabilities are required.
